text:
@realDonaldTrump @Varneyco Your buddy, Herman Cain has died from COVID-19 after attending your ego rally in Tulsa. Now this bit of news. Smart folks KNOW masks help save lives. Your supporters are not smart folks, obviously!
https://t.co/BUdxgPI8Ak
